mapper.sql: select msg_id, from_id, to_list as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, is_external, contact from we_chat_contact_msg
mapper.select: select t.*, wc.customer_name as name, wc.avatar from ( select receiver, msg_time, `action`, msg_type, contact from ( select to_list as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where from_id = #{fromId} and is_external = 0 and room_id = '' union select from_id as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where FIND_IN_SET(#{fromId}, to_list) and is_external = 0 and room_id = '' order by msg_time desc ) as msg group by receiver order by msg.msg_time desc) t inner join we_customer wc on t.receiver = wc.external_userid and wc.add_user_id = #{fromId}

select t.*, ifnull(wu.user_name, wc.customer_name) as name, ifnull(wu.avatar, wc.avatar) as avatar from (select receiver, msg_time, `action`, msg_type, contact from (select to_list as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where from_id = #{fromId} and room_id = ''
and contact like concat('%', #{contact}, '%')
union select from_id as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where FIND_IN_SET(#{fromId}, to_list) and room_id = ''
and contact like concat('%', #{contact}, '%')
order by msg_time desc) as msg group by receiver order by msg.msg_time desc) as t left join sys_user wu on t.receiver = wu.we_user_id and (case when LOCATE('wm', t.receiver) or LOCATE('wo', t.receiver) then 0 else 1 end) = 1 left join we_customer wc on t.receiver = wc.external_userid and (case when LOCATE('wm', t.receiver) or LOCATE('wo', t.receiver) then 0 else 1 end) = 0;

select t.*, wu.user_name as name, wu.avatar from ( select receiver, msg_time, `action`, msg_type, contact from ( select to_list as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where from_id = #{fromId} and is_external = 1 and room_id = '' union select from_id as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where FIND_IN_SET(#{fromId}, to_list) and is_external = 1 and room_id = '' order by msg_time desc ) as msg group by receiver order by msg.msg_time desc) t inner join sys_user wu on t.receiver = wu.we_user_id

select t.*, wg.group_name as name, '' as avatar from ( select receiver, msg_time, `action`, msg_type, contact from ( select room_id as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where from_id = #{fromId} and room_id <> '' union select room_id as receiver, `action`, msg_time, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg where FIND_IN_SET(#{fromId}, to_list) and room_id <> '' order by msg_time desc ) as msg group by receiver order by msg.msg_time desc) t inner join we_group wg on t.receiver = wg.chat_id

select from_id, msg_time, room_id, `action`, msg_type, contact from we_chat_contact_msg t
and (t.from_id = #{fromId} or t.to_list = #{fromId})
and (t.to_list = #{toList} or t.from_id = #{toList})
and t.room_id = #{roomId}
and t.room_id = ''
and find_in_set(t.msg_type,#{msgType})
and t.action = #{action}
and t.contact like concat('%', #{contact}, '%')
AND date_format(t.msg_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format(t.msg_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and exists(select 1 from sys_user su where su.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%') and t.from_id = su.we_user_id)
and (exists(select 1 from we_group_member wgm where wgm.name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%') and t.from_id = wgm.user_id and wgm.type = 2) or exists(select 1 from we_customer wc where wc.customer_name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%') and t.from_id = wc.external_userid ))
